info.title: The goakit example upstream service
info.description: Fetcher is a service that makes GET requests to arbitrary URLs and stores the results in the downstream 'archiver' service.

get.description: Fetch makes a GET request to the given URL and stores the results in the archiver service which must be running or the request fails

archive_href.description: The href to the corresponding archive in the archiver service

status.description: HTTP status code returned by fetched service
